g.text: Display top 10 products by sales volume
Support time intervals (hour, day, week, month, year)
Display approximate results for recent data
Display accurate results for older data
Handle 10 billion sales events per day
Combine data from batch and streaming layers
Create top_1000 view for dashboard queries
Process all data through streaming pipeline
Match host IDs to product IDs
Handle the combination of product ID and timestamp
Use Hash table and max-heap approach
Additional aggregation tiers for high load
